summary: My first attempt of mod, simply overwrites khajiits so they use custom animations through "PC Exclusive Animation Path" by xp32, my solution to "KISS - Khajiit Cat Sprint and Sneak" (working only for vanilla khajiits)
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5][b][size=2]My first attempt of mod, simply overwrites khajiits so they use custom
animations through "[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14871][color=#1e84cc]PC Exclusive Animation Path[/color][/url]" [size=1]by [color=#1e84cc]xp32[/color][/size], my solution to
"[color=#1e84cc][/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22604][color=#1e84cc]KISS - Khajiit Cat Sprint and Sneak[/color][/url]" [size=1]by [color=#1e84cc][b]0r080r0[/b] [/color][/size](working only for vanilla khajiits)
[/size][size=6]
[color=#ff0000]IMPORTANT[/color][/size][/b][/size]
[color=#000000][size=6]_[/size][/color][color=#ffff00][size=6]_[/size][/color][color=#000000][size=6]_[/size][/color][color=#ffff00][size=6]_[/size][/color][color=#000000][size=6]_[/size][/color][color=#ffff00][size=6]_[/size][/color][color=#000000][size=6]_[/size][/color][color=#ffff00][size=6]_[/size][/color][color=#000000][size=6]_[/size][/color][color=#ffff00][size=6]_[/size][/color][color=#000000][size=6]_[/size][/color][color=#ffff00][size=6]_[/size][/color][color=#000000][size=6]_[/size][/color][color=#ffff00][size=6]_[/size][/color][color=#000000][size=6]_[/size][/color][color=#ffff00][size=6]_[/size][/color][color=#000000][size=6]_[/size][/color][color=#ffff00][size=6]_[/size][/color][color=#000000][size=6]_[/size][/color][color=#ffff00][size=6]_[/size][/color][color=#000000][size=6]_[/size][/color][color=#ffff00][size=6]_[/size][/color][color=#000000][size=6]_[/size][/color][color=#ffff00][size=6]_[/size][/color][color=#000000][size=6]_[/size][/color][color=#ffff00][size=6]_[/size][/color][color=#000000][size=6]_[/size][/color][color=#ffff00][size=6]_[/size][/color]

[color=#ffff00][size=3]Make sure to put "khajiifix.esp" right below PCEA's  in load order![/size][/color]
[color=#ffff00][size=6]_[/size][/color][color=#000000][size=6]_[/size][/color][color=#ffff00][size=6]_[/size][/color][color=#000000][size=6]_[/size][/color][color=#ffff00][size=6]_[/size][/color][color=#000000][size=6]_[/size][/color][color=#ffff00][size=6]_[/size][/color][color=#000000][size=6]_[/size][/color][color=#ffff00][size=6]_[/size][/color][color=#000000][size=6]_[/size][/color][color=#ffff00][size=6]_[/size][/color][color=#000000][size=6]_[/size][/color][color=#ffff00][size=6]_[/size][/color][color=#000000][size=6]_[/size][/color][color=#ffff00][size=6]_[/size][/color][color=#000000][size=6]_[/size][/color][color=#ffff00][size=6]_[/size][/color][color=#000000][size=6]_[/size][/color][color=#ffff00][size=6]_[/size][/color][color=#000000][size=6]_[/size][/color][color=#ffff00][size=6]_[/size][/color][color=#000000][size=6]_[/size][/color][color=#ffff00][size=6]_[/size][/color][color=#000000][size=6]_[/size][/color][color=#ffff00][size=6]_[/size][/color][color=#000000][size=6]_[/size][/color][color=#ffff00][size=6]_[/size][/color][color=#000000][size=6]_[/size][/color]

This is obviously still in BETA, it shouldnt mess with anything serious, since it's only purpose is to make khajiits animation path be the original one,which leads to your  installed animation mod and such...  instead of PCEA custom path for vanilla animations.
[size=1]

It's a simple work in CK, but I thought this could simplify the work for some people who doesnt really feel like doing all this.
In few words, I'm just doing this in order to help those who can't get it to work.


This is my first attempt so I cannot assure there wont be any problem with it, BUT i doubt it could make a major problem since
by simply deactivating this mod, everything should go back to normal, AND, this mod only gives default values to vanilla khajiits
[/size][/center]
author: Kasichyko
